VolunteerProfile.title: Volunteer Profile
VolunteerProfile.description: Represents a volunteer user in the system.

id.description: The volunteer's unique ID, matching their Auth UID.

avatarUrl.description: URL for the volunteer's profile picture.

tagline.description: A short, catchy phrase describing the volunteer.

skills.description: A list of the volunteer's skills.

experience.description: A summary of the volunteer's professional experience.

id.description: The non-profit's unique ID, matching their Auth UID.

Project.title: Project
Project.description: A specific project posted by a non-profit.

nonProfitId.description: The ID of the owning non-profit.

description.description: A detailed description of the project.

VolunteerProject.title: Volunteer-Project Link
VolunteerProject.description: A record linking a volunteer to a project they have selected.

Message.title: Message
Message.description: A message sent between two users.

/volunteers/{volunteerId}.description: Stores public profiles for all volunteers.

/nonprofits/{nonProfitId}.description: Stores public profiles for all non-profit organizations.

/nonprofits/{nonProfitId}/projects/{proj.description: Stores projects, nested under the non-profit that owns them.

/volunteerProjects/{volunteerProjectId}.description: A collection linking volunteers to the projects they've signed up for. This facilitates many-to-many relationships.

/messages/{messageId}.description: A collection for all messages. Security rules ensure that a message can only be read by the sender and recipient.
